description:
Lina`s party gets away from the monsters and go into the cave where the Bible is supposed to be.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adevărul de 1000 de ani / Perfidul rege al dragonilor demoni
La vérité du millenaire ! (La trahison du Seigneur des Démons)
Sennen no Shinjitsu! Uragiri no Maryuuou!
The Thousand Year Old Truth! The Traitorous Demon Dragon King!
千年の真実! 裏切りの魔竜王!
